content: मंथः [मथ्-करणे घञ्] {@--1@} Churning shaking about, stirring agitating; मंथादिव क्षुभ्य ति गांगमंभः <ls>U. 7. 16</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 3.</ls> {@--2@} Killing destroying. {@--3@} A mixed beverage. {@--4@} A churningstick (मंथा also). {@--5@} The sun. {@--6@} A ray of the sun. {@--7@} Excretion of rheum from the eyes, mucus (from the eyes), cataract. {@--8@} An instrument for kindling fire by attrition. {@--9@} A spoon for stirring. {@--10@} A kind of antelope.
